DarkMouse::

"Last I knew, Megatron and Aracnia were out getting something set up 
for a new base."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Terrorsaur:
> 
> 
> 
> "Well, I remember when Megatron left." Terrorsaur said. "It was in 
> the middle of an attack. We had to abandon the cave. They even 
wanted 
> me to be leader. I did go to Black Arachnia's group. But I didn't 
> last. I went off to find out what Megatron was up to. He had some 
> kind of plan." He shrugged his wings. "I didn't get much 
information 
> that I wanted to. When I lost sight of Megatron, I left, and I 
think 
> I got frost bite on my wings on the way back."
> 
> "Big whoop," Quickstrike said sarcasticly. "Coulda done better on 
the 
> spyin' job. Heck, ah coulda done better. An' ah'm uh traitor." He 
> quickly looked around.
> 
> Terrorsaur rolled his gren eyes at him. "Where is Megatron now?"
